Class FactbookLoader

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.geography.loaders.FactbookLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputLoader<Map<String, FactbookLoader.CountryProfile>>, ResourceLoader<Map<String, FactbookLoader.CountryProfile>>
public class FactbookLoader extends Object implements InputLoader<Map<String, FactbookLoader.CountryProfile>>
Loads country data from CIA World Factbook-style data.

Provides extended country information including:

  • Geography: area, coordinates, borders, coastline
  • Demographics: population, growth rate, life expectancy
  • Government: type, capital, independence date
  • Economy: GDP, major industries

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • getResourcePath

      public String getResourcePath()
      Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
      Returns the base path where this loader's resources are located.

      For file-based loaders, this is typically a classpath resource path like "/org/jscience/chemistry/". For API-based loaders, this may return the API base URL or null.

      Specified by:
      getResourcePath in interface ResourceLoader<Map<String, FactbookLoader.CountryProfile>>
      Returns:
      the resource path, or null if not applicable
